wikipedia_page.main: Francis Arthur Knott (11 August 1882 – 24 March 1958) was a British middle-distance running athlete.  He competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics in London. He was born in Haringey, London. In the 1500 metres, Knott placed fourth in his initial semifinal heat and did not advance to the final.
